title: Cancer Biol & Biotech
description: This course covers basic concepts of cancer biology and new technologies that are being developed to understand, detect, treat and prevent cancer.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ((BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or BIOL 1510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 1511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
